jparsec.util

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • jparsec.util.Configuration

  • public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to configure the behavior of JPARSEC in the current JVM.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    T. Alonso Albi - OAN (Spain)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean APPLET_MODE
      True to set applet mode.
      static int BIG_DECIMAL_PRECISION_DECIMAL_PLACES
      Holds the number of decimal places for the precision of the operations in big decimal mode.
      static java.math.RoundingMode BIG_DECIMAL_PRECISION_ROUNDING_MODE
      Holds the rounding mode for division operation in bid decimal mode.
      static java.lang.String FORCE_JPARSEC_LIB_DIRECTORY
      Forces the /lib subdirectory of JPARSEC (with all dependencies) to be at certain path.
      static java.lang.String FORCE_TEMP_DIRECTORY
      Forces the temporal directory of the system to be at certain path.
      static java.lang.String JPL_EPHEMERIDES_FILES_EXTERNAL_PATH
      Location of the files of JPL ephemerides, DE405 or any other integration.
      static int MAX_CACHE_SIZE
      Holds the number of similar instances that can be cached simultaneously in the database when using the class ReadFile.
      static int MAXIMUM_DAYS_FROM_ELEMENTS_ARTIFICIAL_SATELLITES
      Holds the maximum acceptable difference of days between the date of the orbital elements of artificial satellites and the date they can be shown.
      static int MAXIMUM_DAYS_FROM_ELEMENTS_ARTIFICIAL_SATELLITES_BETWEEN_TWO_QUERIES
      Holds the maximum number of days the cache file at /tmp will be used before updating it to a new one.
      static int MAXIMUM_DAYS_FROM_ELEMENTS_COMETS_ASTEROIDS
      Holds the maximum acceptable difference of days between the date of the orbital elements of comets/asteroids and the date they can be shown.
      static int MAXIMUM_DAYS_FROM_ELEMENTS_COMETS_ASTEROIDS_BETWEEN_TWO_QUERIES
      Holds the maximum number of days the cache file at /tmp will be used before updating it to a new one.
      static int MAXIMUM_DAYS_FROM_ELEMENTS_COMETS_ASTEROIDS_QUERY
      Holds the maximum acceptable difference of days between the date of the orbital elements of comets/asteroids and the date of the rendering to get accurate positions.
      static java.lang.String PATH_GILDAS_GAG_EXEC
      Path to Gildas (GAG) exec directory name (for example pc-debianlenny-g95).
      static java.lang.String PATH_GILDAS_GAG_ROOT
      Path to Gildas (GAG) root directory (for example gildas-exe-dec08b).
      static int QUERY_TIMEOUT
      Time out for the queries in milliseconds.

    • Field Detail

      • MAX_CACHE_SIZE

        public static int MAX_CACHE_SIZE
        Holds the number of similar instances that can be cached simultaneously in the database when using the class ReadFile. This means, for instance, the number of different sky renderings that can be hold on memory per thread (saving orbital elements, stars, ...).

      • MAXIMUM_DAYS_FROM_ELEMENTS_ARTIFICIAL_SATELLITES

        public static int MAXIMUM_DAYS_FROM_ELEMENTS_ARTIFICIAL_SATELLITES
        Holds the maximum acceptable difference of days between the date of the orbital elements of artificial satellites and the date they can be shown.

      • MAXIMUM_DAYS_FROM_ELEMENTS_COMETS_ASTEROIDS

        public static int MAXIMUM_DAYS_FROM_ELEMENTS_COMETS_ASTEROIDS
        Holds the maximum acceptable difference of days between the date of the orbital elements of comets/asteroids and the date they can be shown.

      • MAXIMUM_DAYS_FROM_ELEMENTS_COMETS_ASTEROIDS_QUERY

        public static int MAXIMUM_DAYS_FROM_ELEMENTS_COMETS_ASTEROIDS_QUERY
        Holds the maximum acceptable difference of days between the date of the orbital elements of comets/asteroids and the date of the rendering to get accurate positions.

      • MAXIMUM_DAYS_FROM_ELEMENTS_COMETS_ASTEROIDS_BETWEEN_TWO_QUERIES

        public static int MAXIMUM_DAYS_FROM_ELEMENTS_COMETS_ASTEROIDS_BETWEEN_TWO_QUERIES
        Holds the maximum number of days the cache file at /tmp will be used before updating it to a new one.

      • MAXIMUM_DAYS_FROM_ELEMENTS_ARTIFICIAL_SATELLITES_BETWEEN_TWO_QUERIES

        public static int MAXIMUM_DAYS_FROM_ELEMENTS_ARTIFICIAL_SATELLITES_BETWEEN_TWO_QUERIES
        Holds the maximum number of days the cache file at /tmp will be used before updating it to a new one.

      • QUERY_TIMEOUT

        public static int QUERY_TIMEOUT
        Time out for the queries in milliseconds. Use <= 0 to disable downloads.

      • FORCE_JPARSEC_LIB_DIRECTORY

        public static java.lang.String FORCE_JPARSEC_LIB_DIRECTORY
        Forces the /lib subdirectory of JPARSEC (with all dependencies) to be at certain path. Default is null to obtain it automatically.

      • FORCE_TEMP_DIRECTORY

        public static java.lang.String FORCE_TEMP_DIRECTORY
        Forces the temporal directory of the system to be at certain path. Default is null to obtain it automatically.

      • APPLET_MODE

        public static boolean APPLET_MODE
        True to set applet mode. In this case the impossibility of writing to temporal directory is overtaken by reading some files in memory.

      • PATH_GILDAS_GAG_ROOT

        public static java.lang.String PATH_GILDAS_GAG_ROOT
        Path to Gildas (GAG) root directory (for example gildas-exe-dec08b).

      • PATH_GILDAS_GAG_EXEC

        public static java.lang.String PATH_GILDAS_GAG_EXEC
        Path to Gildas (GAG) exec directory name (for example pc-debianlenny-g95).

      • JPL_EPHEMERIDES_FILES_EXTERNAL_PATH

        public static java.lang.String JPL_EPHEMERIDES_FILES_EXTERNAL_PATH
        Location of the files of JPL ephemerides, DE405 or any other integration. Set to null to use JPARSEC file if it is available.

      • BIG_DECIMAL_PRECISION_DECIMAL_PLACES

        public static int BIG_DECIMAL_PRECISION_DECIMAL_PLACES
        Holds the number of decimal places for the precision of the operations in big decimal mode. Default is 18.

      • BIG_DECIMAL_PRECISION_ROUNDING_MODE

        public static java.math.RoundingMode BIG_DECIMAL_PRECISION_ROUNDING_MODE
        Holds the rounding mode for division operation in bid decimal mode. Default is 'half up'.

    • Method Detail

      • getResourceLastModifiedTime

        public static AstroDate getResourceLastModifiedTime(java.lang.String j,
                                    java.lang.String d,
                                    java.lang.String f)
                                             throws JPARSECException
        Returns the last time a given resource was modified.
        Parameters:
        j - The jar file name. See FileIO class.
        d - The path to the directory where the file is located. See FileIO class.
        f - The name of the file.
        Returns:
        The date, or null if it is unknown.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • isAcceptableDateForArtificialSatellites

        public static boolean isAcceptableDateForArtificialSatellites(AstroDate astro)
                                                       throws JPARSECException
        Returns if a date is acceptable to show artificial satellites.
        Parameters:
        astro - The date in UTC.
        Returns:
        True or false.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • isAcceptableDateForComets

        public static boolean isAcceptableDateForComets(AstroDate astro,
                                boolean criteriaForAccuracy)
                                         throws JPARSECException
        Returns if a date is acceptable to show comets.
        Parameters:
        astro - The date in UTC.
        criteriaForAccuracy - True to consider the lower time span for accuracy.
        Returns:
        True or false.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • isAcceptableDateForAsteroids

        public static boolean isAcceptableDateForAsteroids(AstroDate astro,
                                   boolean criteriaForAccuracy)
                                            throws JPARSECException
        Returns if a date is acceptable to show asteroids.
        Parameters:
        astro - The date in UTC.
        criteriaForAccuracy - True to consider the lower time span for accuracy.
        Returns:
        True or false.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • isAcceptableDateForTransNeptunians

        public static boolean isAcceptableDateForTransNeptunians(AstroDate astro,
                                         boolean criteriaForAccuracy)
                                                  throws JPARSECException
        Returns if a date is acceptable to show transNeptunian objects.
        Parameters:
        astro - The date in UTC.
        criteriaForAccuracy - True to consider the lower time span for accuracy.
        Returns:
        True or false.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • updateArtificialSatellitesInTempDir

        public static java.lang.String updateArtificialSatellitesInTempDir(AstroDate astro)
                                                            throws JPARSECException
        Updates the orbital elements of artificial satellites writing the new file to the temporal directory.
        Parameters:
        astro - The date to show artificial satellites.
        Returns:
        Null if the orbital elements in orbital_elements.jar are already acceptable, null if the simulation date is too far from current date (so updating the file would not be acceptable too), and the path of the temporal file if the file already exists and it is acceptable or if it has been successfully downloaded. If not null the process of reading the temp file can continue to draw the objects.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • updateCometsInTempDir

        public static java.lang.String updateCometsInTempDir(AstroDate astro)
                                              throws JPARSECException
        Updates the orbital elements of comets writing the new file to the temporal directory.
        Parameters:
        astro - The date to show comets.
        Returns:
        Null if the orbital elements in orbital_elements.jar is already acceptable, null if the simulation date is too far from current date (so updating the file would not be acceptable too), and the path of the temporal file if the file already exists and it is acceptable or if it has been successfully downloaded. If not null the process of reading the temp file can continue to draw the objects.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • updateAsteroidsInTempDir

        public static java.lang.String updateAsteroidsInTempDir(AstroDate astro)
                                                 throws JPARSECException
        Updates the orbital elements of asteroids writing the new file to the temporal directory.
        Parameters:
        astro - The date to asteroids.
        Returns:
        Null if the orbital elements in orbital_elements.jar is already acceptable, null if the simulation date is too far from current date (so updating the file would not be acceptable too), and the path of the temporal file if the file already exists and it is acceptable or if it has been successfully downloaded. If not null the process of reading the temp file can continue to draw the objects.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • updateTransNeptuniansInTempDir

        public static java.lang.String updateTransNeptuniansInTempDir(AstroDate astro)
                                                       throws JPARSECException
        Updates the orbital elements of transneptunians writing the new file to the temporal directory.
        Parameters:
        astro - The date to show transneptunians.

If not null the process of reading the temp file can continue to draw the objects.
